section.34: The Book of Hunting, Slaughter, and what may be Eaten

hadiths.text: Shaddid b. Aus said:Two are the things which I remember Allah's Messenger (ï·º) having said: Verily Allah has enjoined goodness to everything; so when you kill, kill in a good way and when you slaughter, slaughter in a good way. So every one of you should sharpen his knife, and let the slaughtered animal die comfortably
